newsitem.title: USA: Mariner Health names Hansen as new CFO.
newsitem.headline: Mariner Health names Hansen as new CFO.

text.p: Mariner Health Group Inc Wednesday said that David Hansen has been appointed as executive vice president and chief financial officer, replacing Jeffrey Kinell.
Hansen, 44, has served as a partner with Coopers & Lybrand, for the past eight years. At Coopers Hansen specialized in for-profit health care, high technology companies and service businesses.
The company said Kinell left to become president and chief executive of a start-up company involved with physician practice management.
